title: Add admin-configurable segment/ICP weighting controls (UI + permissions)

sections.text: Expose the segment/ICP weighting configuration from the scoring service in an Admin settings UI so Product/Support can adjust influence without engineering changes. Add role-based access (e.g., Admin/PM only) and validation/guardrails (min/max ranges, reset-to-default) to prevent extreme weight values. Ensure changes are versioned and written to the score audit trail so priority shifts are defensible and debuggable.
